summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing construction of Contract No. 4 of the Rainier-Hanford diagonal Watershed Sewer Improvement Project to separate the existing combined sewers in the area generally bounded by South Dearborn Street on the north, Rainier Avenue South on the east, South Bayview Street on the South, and 14th Avenue South, 13th Avenue South and 12th Avenue South on the west, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
